edge: Angrezi Medium is the sequel to the successful Hindi film Hindi Medium, as confirmed by producer Dinesh Vijan in January 2018.
In Angrezi Medium, actor Deepak Dobriyal plays the role of Khan's brother in the movie.
Deepak Dobriyal's character in Angrezi Medium is revealed to have a cousin played by Manu Rishi, both of whom run mithai shops and are rivals in business.
In Angrezi Medium, actor Pankaj Tripathi joins the cast as travel agent Tony.
Actress Poorvi Jain plays the role of Irrfan Khan's wife Rashi in Angrezi Medium, as announced by director Homi Adajania on his Twitter account.
